name: Kecleon
description: The Color Swap Pokémon. Kecleon is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception-this Pokémon can't change the zigzag pattern on its belly.

abilities.name: Color Change
abilities.description: When hit by a damaging attack, this Pokémon's type changes to the type that hit it. It takes on the new type's resistances, vulnerabilities, and immunities.

abilities.name: Protean
abilities.description: This Pokémon's type changes to the type of move it uses, just before the move is used. It takes on the new type's resistances, vulnerabilities, and immunities.
